devdoc.author: Babylon Finance Executes a borrow operation

params._asset: Asset to receive into this operation
params._data: Operation data (e.g. Token to borrow) param _garden              Garden of the strategy
params._integration: Address of the integration to execute

params._percentage: of capital to exit from the strategy

devdoc.title: BorrowOperation

getNAV(bytes,address,address).notice: Gets the NAV of the lend op in the reserve asset

getName().notice: Returns the name of the operation

validateOperation(bytes,address,address,.notice: Sets operation data for the borrow operation param _data                   Operation data param _garden                 Garden param _integration            Integration used
